isis.stitle: INSTRUMENTS (Data Link Driven Instrument Cluster) - FE 300 and IC Bus - OPERATION - FUEL level GAUGE

svcproc.title: FUEL level GAUGE
svcproc.para: The battery voltage is to circuit A13/A13F, fuse F22, circuit A28/A28B, the green instrument cluster (11), pin 10 to the fuel gauge. The level of fuel in the vehicle fuel tank is sensed by the fuel sending unit (37). The sending unit feeds an electrical voltage through circuit K36, pin A of connector (37), circuit K36, pin D of connector (2) and circuit A36, pin 3 of connector (11) to the fuel gauge, which displays the fuel level. The fuel sender (37) pin B is grounded through circuits K36-G/K11-GJ to the (J10) engine ground. The fuel gauge is grounded through pin 2 of connector (11) circuits A28-G/A11-GB/A11-G to the (J1) platform ground.
